summary: The module offers utilities for managing deprecated features in the Prefect framework. It defines a custom warning class, functions to generate deprecation messages, and decorators/wrappers that emit warnings when deprecated callables, fields, or parameters are accessed. It also provides mechanisms to register and alias moved or renamed modules, ensuring backward compatibility while guiding users toward updated APIs.
business_intent: Enable consistent deprecation handling and backward compatibility across the Prefect codebase, informing users of outdated features and encouraging migration to newer interfaces.
